mapper.select: select r_no, c_no, r_title, r_active, to_char(r_date,'yy.mm.dd hh24:mi') r_date from request where r_writer=#{value} and r_no not in (select r.r_no from apply a, request r where a.r_no = r.r_no)
select r_no from request where r_writer=#{value} and r_active=0 order by r_no
select * from request r, (select * from apply where g_no = #{value}) a where r.r_no = a.r_no and r_active=1 order by r.r_no
select r_no, c_no, r_title, r_content, to_char(r_date,'yy.mm.dd hh24:mi') r_date from request where r_no=#{value}
SELECT count(*) FROM request WHERE c_no=#{c_no}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, r.* FROM (
SELECT * FROM request a WHERE a.r_no not in (select r_no from apply where g_no = #{g_no}) and c_no=#{c_no} and a.r_active=1 ORDER BY a.r_no ) r ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) AND ((#{page}) * 10)
select distinct r.r_no, r.c_no, r.r_title, to_char(r_date,'yy.mm.dd hh24:mi') r_date from request r, apply a where r.r_no = a.r_no and r_writer=#{value} and r_active=1 order by r_no
mapper.update: update request set r_active=0 where r_no=#{value}
mapper.select: select m.m_no, m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_email, m.m_tel, m.m_intro from ( select * from request r, (select * from apply) a where r.r_no = a.r_no and r.r_no = ${value} and r_active=1) b, member m where b.g_no = m.m_no
select count(*) from apply where r_no=#{r_no}
